name: Druantia Baroque Wooden Chest of Drawers - Light Grey
description: We can't decide what we like best about this stunning chest of drawers: we're torn between the ornate, Baroque-inspired carved detailing and the contrasting textures applied to its surface. Made from recycled pine, the Druantia's lightly curved top and skirt are incredibly sleek, which softens the more traditional feel of the floral detailing and gently distressed surfaces that lend the piece a rustic look.
